(define_automaton "nds32_machine")

(define_cpu_unit "general_unit" "nds32_machine")

(define_insn_reservation "simple_insn" 1
			 (eq_attr "type" "unknown,load,store,move,alu,compare,branch,call,misc")
			 "general_unit")
